long_description: Classic meets modern in the Clarks Faraway Canyon shoes. Lace up this leather bootie with tights, leggings or rolled jeans for laid-back style this season. Crafted of extra-soft beeswax leather or suede leather with hand-stitched details, the shoes feature a signature wedge of natural plantation crepe. Soft leather linings and OrthoLite? footbeds add cushioned comfort. Clarks Faraway Canyon shoes have EVA midsoles and crepe rubber outsoles.
short_description: Classic meets modern in the Clarks Faraway Canyon shoes. Lace up this leather bootie with tights, leggings or rolled jeans for laid-back style this season.
